name: nAddrs
description: the number of addresses in this chunk

name: nApps
description: the number of appearances in this chunk

name: firstApp
description: the first appearance in this chunk

name: latestApp
description: the last appeaerance in this chunk

name: firstTs
description: the first timestamp in this chunk

name: latestTs
description: the last timestamp in this chunk

name: fileDate
description: the file date of this chunk

name: indexSizeBytes
description: the size in bytes of the index portion of this chunk

name: indexHash
description: the IPFS hash of the index portion of this chunk

name: bloomSizeBytes
description: the size in bytes of the bloom filter for this chunk

name: bloomHash
description: the IPFS has of the bloom filter for this chunk
